DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this registry study is to gather safety information on the current clinical use of and the safety of DEFINITY®
DOC.brief_title: A Prospective, Phase IV, Surveillance Registry Study to Evaluate the Safety of DEFINITY® in Clinical Practice
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria Patients who, in the investigator's opinion, require DEFINITY® echocardiography due to suboptimal, unenhanced images. Exclusion criteria Known hypersensitivity to perflutren, DEFINITY®, or other echo contrast agent. Prior SAE associated with perflutren, DEFINITY®, or administration of other echo contrast agent.
